title: About
description:
Hello, I'm Marc-Antoine. I absolutely love crafting elegant solutions to a wide array of problems. I'm fascinated by theory-crafting and I will love challenging the status quo.

I love efficient and people-driven cultures. Work should adapt to your lifestyle, not the other way around.
